CustomField.formula: IF( EmailBeforeSendDatePassed__c, IF( EmailBeforeSent__c, '‚úÖ ' + $Label.EmailConfirmation_Sent, IF( AND(EmailBeforeConfirmation__c, NOT(EmailBeforeSent__c)), '‚ùå ' + $Label.EmailConfirmation_CancelledCourse, IF( Cancel__c, '‚ùå ' + $Label.EmailConfirmation_CancelledCourse, IF( EmailBeforeConfirmation__c, IF( TODAY() = EmailBeforeDate__c, IF( TIMENOW() >= TIMEVALUE("18:00:00.000"), '‚ùå ' + $Label.EmailConfirmation_SendError, '‚è≥ ' + $Label.EmailConfirmation_Scheduled ), '‚ùå ' + $Label.EmailConfirmation_SendError ), 'üí§ ' + $Label.EmailConfirmation_NotScheduled ) ) ) ), '' )
CustomField.label: Status
